S

save() - Method in class controller.CalendarController
This method "saves" the state of the Calendar by writing to the save file that the controller contains.
setColor(String) - Method in class model.Event
This method sets the color of the Event to the inputed color
setDate(int) - Method in class model.Day
Sets the Day's date to the new passed in date
setDay(int) - Method in class model.Day
This sets the current day of the week to the passed in day
setDay(Day) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the Day object of the event to the passed in day
setDay(Day, int) - Method in class model.Month
Sets the Day object at the given dayNum in the array to the Day object that is passed in.
setDay(int, Day) - Method in class model.Week
This method sets the Week's day of the week to the inputed Day
setDays(Day[]) - Method in class model.Week
This method sets the Day array of the Week to the inputed Day array
setEH(int) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the end hour to the passed in end hour
setEM(int) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the end minute to the passed in end minute
setEvents(List<Event>) - Method in class model.Day
This method sets the events to the passed in list of events
setLabel(String) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the label to the new passed in label
setLoc(String) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the location to the new passed in location
setMonth(String) - Method in class model.Day
Sets the month the Day is in to the new passed in month
setNotes(String) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the notes of the event to the new passed in notes
setSH(int) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the start hour of the event to the new start hour
setSM(int) - Method in class model.Event
Sets the start minute to the new passed in start minute
start(Stage) - Method in class view.CalendarView
start initializes the controller to use and the necessary variables.
